68
Making the most of 
antenatal care
Having regular antenatal care 
is important for your health and 
the health of your baby. Most 
antenatal services are now 
provided in easily accessible 
community settings. Waiting 
times in clinics can vary, and 
this	can	be	particularly	difficult	
if you have young children with 
you. Try to plan ahead to make 
your visits easier. He
